author: aljosa
title: A Cardano businesses focused DAO
description: There is no clear path to establish a business to operate a Cardano based project and launch a relevant crypto/blockchain business model.
solution: Build a business focused DAO to enable easier management of the business part of running a Cardano based project in a legal way.
experience:
Aljosa Mohorovic is a senior developer with team lead, product and business owner experience.
